entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:09 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ivujivik Airport 07:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 81 %

Wind: ESE 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 5. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High zero.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
